title: The Wedding and Other Short Romantic Stories
description: What do you do with a runaway bride, a hot neighbour and flying bagel? You take these one-of-a-kind stories and make a collection. The Wedding and Other Short Romantic Stories is a compilation that will tug at your heartstrings one moment and have you laughing out loud the next. If you love sweet and sexy romantic stories, then The Wedding and Other Short Romantic Stories is for you.
author: Yvonne Harriott
